description.value:
Ondagin are covered in dorsal fins and grow batches of hard scale-like carapaces built into primarily their legs and torso. Their faces are fierce and piranha-like, instead showing an impressively large range of emotion in the eyes.
With numerous fins and carapaced armor, ondagin are often confused for their spring-loaded brethren, the novvagin. However, despite their external similarities, ondagin are built primarily for aquatic life, their body pressurized for ocean floor, and water-starved on land. They’re also born with an inactive second stomach, of sorts, that is used to store water or other liquids without absorbing it for usage later. When in a pinch, they can propel this water at targets like a cannon.
Ondagin, perhaps due to their time in the dark quiet of the ocean, have also developed their minds in such a way that they grow into a natural capability in conjuration—the ability to make a mental image real.

system.classDetails:
Ondagin Traits

  • Attribute Increase: Your Intelligence increases by 1.
  • Skill Proficiency: You have proficiency in the Dexterity (Stealth) skill.
  • Extra Swim Speed: Your swim speed increases by 10 feet.
  • Dorsal Fin: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.MQF6HMUPU1D15Q6N]{Dorsal Fin}
  • Dry Skin: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.KI163OLRCFF8TE05]{Dry Skin}
  • Deep Sea Acclimatized: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.XMQL78V6FPL3AC0Y]{Deep Sea Acclimatized}
  • Water Pouch: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.GQKPLLDIIW3LWOFM]{Water Pouch}
  • Water Cannon: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.IN18SOBFF4I44W0L]{Water Cannon}
  • Natural Conjurer: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.G3QCDY9F91VURUIR]{Natural Conjurer}
